title: Educational Background
description: Explore the milestones and experiences that have shaped my academic journey. From my early education to specialized studies, this page provides an insightful glimpse into the foundations that have fueled my passion for learning. Discover the institutions, degrees, and key achievements that have contributed to my knowledge and skills. Join me on a brief tour of my educational narrative, showcasing the dedication and curiosity that drive my continuous pursuit of excellence.

title: Work Experience
description: Take a journey through my professional growth and accomplishments. Here, you'll find a curated collection of my career milestones, showcasing the diverse roles and projects that have shaped my expertise.

title: Research Project
description: Delve into the intellectual adventures that have fueled my curiosity and contributed to the ever-evolving landscape of knowledge. From conceptualization to execution, this page unfolds the narratives behind my research endeavors

title: Professional Development
description: Immerse yourself in the enriching experiences of workshops, seminars, and training sessions that have sculpted my skills and broadened my horizons. From skill-enhancing workshops to thought-provoking seminars, discover the diverse range of learning opportunities that have played a pivotal role in my professional and personal development.

title: Building Application
description: Here, witness the culmination of coding expertise as I showcase various Python-powered projects and applications. From web-based solutions to versatile desktop applications, each project represents a journey of problem-solving and innovation.

title: Being an Educator
description: This space is a testament to my passion for guiding and inspiring the next generation of engineers. Join me in exploring the dynamic intersection of theory and hands-on experience, tailored for students pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering. From engaging lectures to hands-on projects, this page highlights the strategies employed in fostering a vibrant learning environment.
